Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Mostly \Most"ly\, adv. For the greatest part; for the most part; chiefly; in the main. [1913 Webster]

mostly adv 1: in large part; mainly or chiefly; "These accounts are largely inactive" [syn: {largely}, {for the most part}] 2: usually; as a rule; "by and large it doesn't rain much here" [syn: {by and large}, {generally}, {more often than not}]
